revision.text:
clearscope string '''GetCharacterName''' () const
==Usage== Returns the name of the calling actor as defined in its [[DIALOGUE|conversation script]]. If the actor is not assigned a conversation script, or it is but lacks a conversation name (either the name is set as an empty string or not set at all), then the function falls back to {{c|[[GetTag]]}} to retrieve the actor's {{Property|Tag|tag}} instead.
==Examples== {{noexamples}}
[[Category:ZScript]]
